review: Amazon Fire TV is a restricted device that makes users pay for apps that on any other Android platform or device are normally free. Go with a Roku and get MyMedia Free, Chrome and get Plex Free, stream anything you want. Amazon charges. Furthermore, apps you buy for other Android devices don't transfer to Fire like they do other Android phones and tablets. You will have to re-purchase all your software. Search also doesn't search subscription sites, only Amazons pay as you play movies and content.
author: Socrates Foot
